column4: Having trouble getting a USB live install to work , just downloaded the ISO and used the tool from windows to save it or whatever, anyways after restarting & booting from USB , ubutnu says it's loading, plays the start music then continues to keep the loading screen , although displaying the mouse pointer which is sluggish
What version of Ubuntu? How much RAM do you have?
Have you verified that the CD burned correctly? You can do so from the boot menu (which you can get to by pressing any key within the first 5 seconds of boot).
